properties.description: Large civic church at the heart of Hull Old town. The Minster is generally open Tuesday - Saturday 10am - 4pm. On Thursdays 10.30 - 3pm a Welcome Cafe operates. See website for details. The Minster is closed from Christmas day until Tuesday 16th January 2024.

properties.address: Kings Baptist Church, Cleethorpes, N E Lincolnshire DN35 8LG
properties.description: Open from 04 10 2023. Wednesday Morning 10.00am - 3.00pm then every Wednesday going forward. Bright Church Hall with Good Access and Toilets - refreshments provided and quiet space available. Good Bus Route Nos 9 & 10 every 15 minutes Please note on site parking spaces are very limited. Pre School (Parent/Carer & tots) specific group starting October 5th Thursday morning 10:00 - 13:00 then same time each Thursday going forward. (NB Please visit The Nurture Village Facebook Page to register interest in Pre School sessions.) Located on the sea front - perfect if you enjoy a bracing walk. Very welcoming warm space. Lovely helpful volunteers. Great conversations, bottomless hot drinks and snacks for free. Bring a craft, a book, or a friend.
properties.title: Kings Baptist Church

properties.description: We strive to create a warm and inclusive environment where individuals aged 16 to 25 can come together, socialise, and build meaningful connections with their peers. Our centre offers delicious, affordable meals and complimentary tea and coffee. In addition, we offer a wide range of exciting activities that cater to the interests of young adults, ensuring they have a fun and engaging time with us.
